description_for_human: An OpenAI-compatible API relay that supports /v1/responses, /v1/files, /v1/embeddings, /v1/vector_stores, and registered tool execution via ChatGPT Actions.
description_for_model: Relay API for ChatGPT Team. This service mirrors the official OpenAI API surface (including /v1/responses, /v1/models, /v1/files, /v1/embeddings, /v1/vector_stores, /v1/realtime/sessions, and /v1/tools) at https://chatgpt-team-relay.onrender.com. It is designed to be used from ChatGPT Actions and is compatible with the latest OpenAI Python and Node.js SDKs.
